title: Decorators: A Powerful Weapon in your Python Arsenal
summary: Decorators are an invaluable addition to anyone's arsenal of python tools and tricks. We will learn what a decorator is, how decorators are created, and then explore some of the cooler applications for decorators in our everyday projects.
